body:
I was thinking about doing an IRL video for avicus. I will take probably 100 players and around 20 staff.

If you changed your name to something as a joke like myself please put the IGN you want to be in the video and put your irl picture on this thread!

NO HATE ON THIS THREAD PLEASE!

title: Avicus IRL video!
